entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 12:33 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
